Articles.Content:
Figured i'd pop in and say hi. Finally decided to pay up for the 'full' game after playing around with the demo a little bit a while back.

have to say loving it so far, altho i have a few guys stuck on Mun i need to work out how to rescue. :s

i'll try a rescure mission once i'm feeling a bit more at home with things, maybe do a Nasa and not go back for 40 + years? lol.
Welcome to the forums Monkfish1. Rest assured that even if you leave your Kerbals on Mun for forty years they will still have a smile on their faces when you do come back for them.
